trebleClef.title: Treble Clef Path
trebleClef.subtitle: Learn to read notes in the treble clef

rhythm.title: Rhythm Path
rhythm.subtitle: Keep the beat and learn rhythm patterns

boss.title: Boss Challenges
boss.subtitle: Test your mastery with special challenges

descriptions.Meet Middle C: Learn your very first piano note
descriptions.C and D: Add note D to your collection
descriptions.Play C and D: Practice reading C and D on the staff
descriptions.Note Pairs: Match notes in a fun memory game
descriptions.Three Note Songs: Add the third note to your collection
descriptions.Speed C-D-E: How fast can you recognize C, D, and E?
descriptions.Remember C-D-E: Review what you learned in Unit 1
descriptions.Meet F: Learn note F - the fourth finger
descriptions.C to F Journey: Practice reading from C to F
descriptions.Meet G: Complete the five-finger position with G
descriptions.Five Note Songs: Play melodies using all five notes
descriptions.F-G-A Trio: Practice F, G, and A together
descriptions.Almost There: Practice all seven notes learned so far
descriptions.Full Octave Songs: Play melodies across the full octave
descriptions.Octave Memory: Celebrate the octave with a memory game
descriptions.Octave Master: Master the full octave and unlock eighth notes!
descriptions.C and B: Learn Middle C in bass clef
descriptions.Play C and B: Practice reading C and B in bass clef
descriptions.Speed C-B-A: How fast can you recognize C, B, and A in bass clef?
descriptions.First Bass Challenge: Complete your first bass clef unit!
descriptions.Remember Unit 1: Review what you learned in Unit 1
descriptions.Play with G: Learn note G - the fourth finger
descriptions.Five Finger Songs: Play melodies using all five notes
descriptions.Play with D: Practice all seven notes learned so far
descriptions.Octave Mix: Celebrate the octave with a memory game
descriptions.Speed Octave: How fast can you recognize all the notes?
descriptions.Bass Clef Master: Master the full bass clef octave!
descriptions.Meet Quarter Notes: Learn to play steady quarter notes
descriptions.Practice Quarter Notes: Build confidence with steady quarter notes
descriptions.Meet Half Notes: Learn to hold notes for 2 beats
descriptions.Practice Quarters and Halves: Combine quarter notes and half notes
descriptions.Rhythm Patterns: Mix quarters and halves in fun patterns
descriptions.Speed Challenge: How fast can you play quarters and halves?
descriptions.Basic Beats Master: Prove your mastery of quarters and halves!
descriptions.Meet Whole Notes: Learn to hold notes for 4 full beats
descriptions.Practice Whole Notes: Build confidence holding notes for 4 beats
descriptions.Long and Short: Feel the difference between long and short notes
descriptions.All Basic Durations: Practice with quarters, halves, and wholes
descriptions.Duration Mix: Mix all basic durations in creative patterns
descriptions.Speed Basics: How fast can you play all basic durations?
descriptions.Duration Master: Prove your mastery of all basic durations!
descriptions.Meet Eighth Notes: Learn to play two notes per beat
descriptions.Practice Eighth Notes: Build confidence with two notes per beat
descriptions.Running and Walking: Feel the difference between walking and running
descriptions.Rhythm Variety: Practice mixing quarters, halves, and eighths
descriptions.Speed Running: How fast can you play running notes?
descriptions.Running Notes Master: Prove your mastery of running notes!
descriptions.Meet Quarter Rest: Learn to count silence - 1 beat of rest
descriptions.Practice Rests: Practice quarter and half rests together
descriptions.Meet Whole Rest: Learn 4 beats of silence - a full measure of rest
descriptions.Speed Silence: How fast can you count silence?
descriptions.Silence Master: Prove your mastery of counting silence!
descriptions.Waltz Time (3/4): Learn to play in 3/4 time - 3 beats per measure
descriptions.Practice All Dotted Notes: Master both dotted half and dotted quarter notes
descriptions.Speed Dots: How fast can you play dotted rhythms?
descriptions.Dotted Notes Master: Prove your mastery of dotted notes and 3/4 time!
descriptions.Meet Sixteenth Notes: Learn to play four notes per beat
descriptions.Practice Sixteenth Notes: Groups of four - one beat at a time
descriptions.Sixteenths and Eighths: Mix sixteenth notes with eighth notes
descriptions.Fast and Faster: Practice mixing fast and slow rhythms
descriptions.Rhythm Champion: Prove your mastery of ALL rhythms!

unlockHints.First Steps Challenge: Complete all 7 lessons above to unlock this challenge!
unlockHints.Five Finger Master: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the challenge!
unlockHints.Octave Master: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the big challenge!
unlockHints.First Bass Challenge: Complete all bass clef lessons above to unlock this challenge!
unlockHints.Mix It Up: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the challenge!
unlockHints.Bass Clef Master: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the big challenge!
unlockHints.Basic Beats Master: Complete all rhythm lessons above to unlock this challenge!
unlockHints.Duration Master: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the challenge!
unlockHints.Running Notes Master: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the challenge!
unlockHints.Silence Master: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the challenge!
unlockHints.Dotted Notes Master: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the challenge!
unlockHints.Rhythm Champion: Complete all lessons in this unit to unlock the ultimate challenge!

pathCompleteMessages.treble_clef: You've mastered all Treble Clef notes!
